name: AYMEN HMID
Profile_description: An enthusiast data scientist student who takes pride in building models that translate data points into business insights. Used my skills to win some Data science challenges, now eager to apply the same knowledge to real-world business problems.

Professional_experience.description: Automatic management of data intended for accounting firms and chartered accountants. Build a custom OCR model to extract useful fields from invoices and receipts.

Achievements: p 3rd place winner at City Hack Extract information from legal documents to verify their authenticity (OCR, NER,OpenCV) p 8th rank in Sindy Logistics challenge Predict the estimated time of arrival (ETA) for motorbike deliveries in Nairobi p 14th rank UmojaHack Tunisia Predict the class of a protein kinase enzyme using its amino acid sequence
